channel.title: Inside The Cave Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Courtney Blackmon
channel.itunes:summary: Sports, Politics, Entertainment, News, Sex, Fashion, and whatever else we want to talk about! Inside The Cave
channel.description: Your typical text group chat gone viral by five different guys with five different views on todays current events. The purpose of the podcast is to provide an opinionated view on Sports, Entertainment, Politics, Sex and Fashion in a comical manner. Each show will end with an interview of someone in the field of Sports, Entertainment, Politics, etcÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

item.itunes:author: Courtney Blackmon
item.itunes:subtitle: A Preview of what's to come with Inside The Cave
item.itunes:summary: How Inside The Cave Got Started

item.title: Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Courtney Blackmon
item.itunes:subtitle: One and Done
item.itunes:summary: The guys discuss Donald Trump, Is it fair that women can make men fathers, and greatest duo debate and more

item.title: Black Boy Chris Interview
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 and Done
item.itunes:summary: Social Media Sensation Black Boy Chris sits down with Inside The Cave

item.title: Episode 2 Sierra Nicole
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Thats 2
item.itunes:summary: Caves Collide when The guys welcome in Sierra Nicole from The Chic Cave and Velle lists the top 10 songs you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to hear making love. All this and more

item.title: Episode 3
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Three Shows
item.itunes:summary: CB calls into Stephen A to talk about Hulk Hogan and Colin Cowherd, The guys talk about Sandra Bland,Big Dawg sounds off on Police Etiquette, Drake and Meek Mill Beef, Top 10 BET Uncut Videos on Dirt Sheet,Jay Double joins the cave, Ced vs CB..again, and is Velle really fired?

item.title: Adult Film Star Misty Stone
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Misty Stone
item.itunes:summary: Misty Stone is one of the biggest names in Adult Entertainment and she calls Inside The Cave for the first time. Adult Film Critics call her the Halle Berry of Adult Entertainment because of her cross over appeal. She is Miss December in Penthouse 2014 and also played Denise in The Cosby Show Porn Parody pre-scandal. Safe to say she is a big deal

item.title: Episode 4
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4
item.itunes:summary: The whole band is together for the first time as the guys welcome D and Lamar on the show for the first time. Discussions on Michael Jordan Meek Mill vs Drake Dirt Sheet and more on the fourth episode of Inside The Cave

item.title: Gotti
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Gotti
item.itunes:summary: Chicago Hip Hop Legend Gotti sits down with Inside The Cave for his most in depth interview EVER! Gotti talks about growing up in Chicago his early life before rap as a street hustler beating a murder case and meeting R.Kelly and forming Boo and Gotti with Boo. Gotti also talks about his relationships with Jay Z Irv Gotti JaRule Nelly and more on this epic interview on Inside The Cave.

item.title: Episode 5 Erykha Ordorica
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5
item.itunes:summary: Cave Crush Erykha Ordorica joins Inside The Cave Dirt Sheet and more

item.title: Summer Slam preview from The Wrestling Classic on Instagram
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5
item.itunes:summary: Summer Slam Preview and Wrestling Talk with Justin from Wrestling Classic on Instagram

item.title: Episode 6
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 6
item.itunes:summary: A male exotic dancer from Chicago name Diamond calls into the show to spill the beans and tell how wild women get at male reviews bachelorette parties lock downs and toy parties CB gives his New Rules International D explains what a Oooga is The Dirt Sheet and Velles Wrap Up

item.title: Miss Tiffany Laos
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Miss Laos
item.itunes:summary: The Beautiful and Sexy model Miss Tiffany Laos is this weeks Caves Crush of the Week. She talks about her cameo in Lil Durks new video Like Me her business relationship with Christina Milian her company Bottle Babes and possibly appearing in PlayBoy. All this and more on this epsisode of Inside The Cave

item.title: Jay Davis
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Jay Davis
item.itunes:summary: If we say he is The Funniest Man in America we would get sued by Kevin Hart and if we say he is The Funniest Man in Chicago we would have beef with Corey Holcomb Lil Rel DeRay and Leon Rogers. So we will go out on a limb and say Jay Davis is The Funniest Man in Chicago thats under 5ft 7 with a 708 area code phone number. Jay comes on Inside The Cave to talk about his new sketch show Choke on That most recent movie Not Another Zombie Movie future projects and high school friends hairy snatch. All this and more on this episode of Inside The Cave.

item.title: Episode 7 Urban Mystic
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Urban Mystic
item.itunes:summary: Rhythm and Blues Soul artist Urban Mystic calls in to the show and talks about his new album Soulful Classics and his new single Tonights the Night. CB also tells Urban Mystic that he is the reason why CB hates the music business. Plus Joe Dirt drops another controversial Dirt Sheet and International D tells us how he really feels during Rapid Fire. Velle wraps up the show and The Dawg returns.

item.title: Hustle Simmons
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Hustle Simmons
item.itunes:summary: Hustle Simmons is the other Simmons that if you donâ€™t know of him you will very soon. To say he is a big deal would be an understatement. Hustle Simmons comes on this episode of Inside The Cave and talks about his event Hustle Palooza bringing in Jay Z and Lebron James for a after party in Chicago and also some NBA talk and how he met Kobe Bryant and what they talked about. Hustle also talks about a negative situation that recieved some negative attention from media outlets earlier this year. We donâ€™t choose sides on this show but its a safe bet that Hustle won. This interview is for everyone not named Dwight Howard.

item.title: The Wrestling Classic on Instagram
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: The Wrestling Classic
item.itunes:summary: In Sports they say NBA comes up with an idea NFL makes it famous and MLB makes all the money off it. Well in Sports Entertainment The Kliq started the attitude era NWO and WCW made it famous and WWE is making all the money off it. Justin from the Wrestling Classic on Instagram comes back on Inside The Cave to talk about the Attitude Era NWO DX Kliq and Scott Hall. We also preview tonights WWE PPV Night of Champions and play a game of Is that Trump or McMahon

item.title: Boo Part 1
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Boo Part 1
item.itunes:summary: Chicago HipHop legend Boo comes on Inside The Cave to discuss the early parts of his career and how hanging out with one of his soon to be NBA friends on one summer night in Chicago changed the course of his life forever when he meets R Kelly. He talks about being on the Life Soundtrack and R.Kellys double CD R. as the group Vegas Cats. Also appearing on his first song with JayZ CamRon and Noreaga as part of the group Vegas Cats with then partner Roy Hamilton the third. He also talks about meeting Nas and how that meeting help change his career and doing a early demo with 50 Cents and later meeting Gotti and forming the group Boo and Gotti

item.title: Episode 8 with the girls from The Guys We F**ked Podcast
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Sorry About Last Night
item.itunes:summary: The Queens of comedy podcast come on Inside The Cave Corinne and Krystyna from the number one podcast on iTunes The Guys We F and play a game of ASK A BLACK GUY. Plus CB gives his quote of the week Joe Dirt brings in another DIRT SHEET Lamar comes on to criticize the show he is part of and Big Dawg gives us his Country Rap tune of the week. All this and more on this weeks episode of Inside The Cave

item.title: Boo part 2
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Boo
item.itunes:summary: Part 2 of Boo sit down with Inside The Cave Boo talks about Boo and Gotti and moving from Rockland Records and R Kelly to Cashmoney Records and Jay Z personally explaining why he at first didnâ€™t want to be on Fiesta with him by breaking down the business aspect of Music business and publishing Boo also tells us how he really feels about groupies before he takes a smoke break

item.title: episode 9
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: episode 9
item.itunes:summary: Inside The Cave explains some of the controversy from episode 8 plus CBs Quote of The Week and The Guys have an open discussion on Gays Mental Health Race Relations and discuss the feud between Matt Barnes and Derrick Fisher another classic Dirt Sheet Big Dawgs Country Rap Tune Velle over uses the N Word and uses every curse word available and CEDs BACK

item.title: Leon Rogers
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedian and one of the hosts of Chicago WGCI Morning Take over on Inside The Cave
item.itunes:summary: Life is all about reinventing yourself and constantly evolving. Most people would be satisfied with being a successful comedian performing and winning Showtime Apollo and being one of the hosts of Chi Towns WGCI Morning Takeover but our guest this week comedian Leon Rogers is constantly evolving his career. On this episode he talks about his early comedy career and prepares us for his future sportscaster career. Leon and CB go at it on sports issues like Derrick Rose injuries, Kobe Bryant and more all to the delight of Joe Dirt. Leon also debuts a few new jokes he has been working on as well. This is a definite must listen to one of Chicagos own Leon Rogers

item.title: Episode 10
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Boo Co Hosts with the guys
item.itunes:summary: Rapper Boo hosts the show this week for Ced with the guys and they tackle the gun violence in Chicago and discuss other headlines of the week most noticeable 50 Cents and Vivivca Fox situation also CBs quote of the week Velle Frugal Tips Big Dawgs Country Rap Tune The Dirt Sheets with Joe Dirt and International D brings his new segment Oooga of the Week plus classic road stories with Boo as he tells us the inside scoop between Lebron and Lil Waynes beef because he was there

item.title: Episode 11 Kevin Lavell
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Kevin Lavell
item.itunes:summary: Young new Chicago artis Kevin Lavell goes Inside The Cave this week and talks about his new Blazing Hot Mix Tape Sorry 4 Nothing and debuts his Intro Chicago Bully and single Muscle feat Young Dro This young artist gives thought provoking comments on the recent crimes and shootings in Chicago and he also lists his Top 5 Rappers Dead or Alive. Kevin may be young but was very mature and positive in this interview and showed Chicago and other artist from Chicago a lot of love. Also in this Episode CB breaks down Cheating love songs Velle gives another frugal tip Lamar criticizes his own show AGAIN and Joe brings another classic Dirt Sheet. The guys also gives their opinions on Charlie Sheen and which celebrities pies they want to eat

item.title: Episode 12
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: The Last Show of 2015
item.itunes:summary: On this last show of 2015 The guys discuss The Golden State Warriors against the 72 and 10 Chicago Bulls CB compares Donald Trumps campaign to a classic 80s Movie Velle gives his frugal tip of the week Big Dawg goes against the rules with his country rap tune of the week Ced and CB go at it in a new segment called Stat Facts of December and Joe Dirt drops his best Dirt Sheet of all time and promotes International D new album and tour all this and more on the year end finale of Inside The Cave

item.title: NBA Christmas Special
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: NBA Talk
item.itunes:summary: While you are enjoying Christmas and the NBA listen to this basketball edition of an earlier recording of Inside The Cave This show kicks off with a tribute to Kobe Bryant from his peers including Lebron James Boo and Basketball scout Ben Curtis joins the guys to discuss the NBA Is Steph Curry the next Michael Jordan are the Bulls better without Coach Thibs and Lamar Odom

item.title: 2015 Wrap Up Show
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Best of 2015
item.itunes:summary: This show starts off with the original intro CB had done for the guys and for some reason they did not like it. This show features 2015 funniest and most controversial moments on Inside The Cave. Clips of interviews with porn star Misty Stone Boo and Gotti Leon Rogers Jay Davis and our Cave Crushes Tiffany Laos and Erykha Ordorica

item.title: Episode 13 part 1
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: part 1
item.itunes:summary: This show is so Big we had to make it two parts. The guys bring in a new FEMALE cohost name Kaylah to do News Headlines Gossip Rumors and Reality shows. The guys give there opinions on Peyton Manning Bill Cosby and The Affluenza Teen. The guys also share there best memories of 2015. CB starts a new hashtag for his Quote of the Week and Velle gives his most ridiculous frugal tip so far PLEASE DONT TRY THIS AT HOME.

item.title: Episode 13 part 2
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: part 2
item.itunes:summary: On Part 2 of this episode Interntional D tells Kaylah what an Oooga is. Ced vs CB January stat facts. Kaylah brings us Entertainment news rumors and reality updates. Cousin Lamar reads us our first fan mail and criticisms of 2016. Big Dawg makes a cameo with a classic country rap tune and Joe Dirt gives us another classic Dirt Sheet. alot of inside jokes and innuendos on this show courtesy of Velle Vel.

item.title: Episode 14 from Playboy Radio Sex Therapist Tyomi Morgan
item.itunes:author: CB
item.itunes:subtitle: Tyomi Morgan
item.itunes:summary: Expert Tyomi Morgan from Playboy Radio and Ebony Magazine comes on to talk about her career as a Sex Therapist and also clears up some stereotypes about Black women and White women in the bedroom. Kaylah gives us the Gossip Rumors Reality Report. Big Dawg drops a classic country rap tune and Joe Dirt gives another classic Dirt Sheet a story that was actually featured on The Late Show on Monday Night.
